gen:link.label:label: BV626_1: The capital charge for risk of increase in lapse rates reported in S.26.04 -Solvency Capital Requirement - Health underwriting risk should be equal to the loss in the value of assets minus liabilities (before the loss absorbing capacity of technical provisions) after the shock, with a minimum of zero. -->Template 1: S.26.04; Expression: If {r0050,c0010} like "9" then {r0420,c0080}=MAX(0,({r0420,c0020}-{r0420,c0030})-({r0420,c0040}-{r0420,c0070}))

BV626_1: The capital charge for risk of increase in lapse rates reported in S.26.04 -Solvency Capital Requirement - Health underwriting risk should be equal to the loss in the value of assets minus liabilities (before the loss absorbing capacity of technical provisions) after the shock, with a minimum of zero. -->Template 1: S.26.04; Expression: If {r0050,c0010} like "9" then {r0420,c0080}=MAX(0,({r0420,c0020}-{r0420,c0030})-({r0420,c0040}-{r0420,c0070}))
